response.overview: Wrong flowers, a Macedonian palm reader, a cunning brother, a village romance, a strange anecdote, a careless friend, a delayed flight... Through a series of quirky, comedic, and endlessly witty situations, Luka, Ellie, Kole and Gala try to figure out what true love really is. And is there a better place for such a story than Belgrade?
response.title: Welcome to Beograd
